text: Allah Taalaa ney behtareen kalam nazil farmaya hai jo aisi kitab hai kay aapas mein milti julti aur baar baar dohraee hui aayaton ki hai jiss say unn logon kay rongtay kharay hojatay hain jo apnay rab ka khof rakhtay hain aakhir mein unn kay jisam aur dil Allah Taalaa kay zikar ki taraf naram hojatay hain yeh hai Allah Taalaa ki hidayat jiss kay zariyey jissay chahaye raah-e-raast per laga deta hai. Aur jissay Allah Taalaa hi raah bhula dey uss ka koi hadi nahi
